item.title: UPS
item.description: score:164 Chances: UPS customers in Taiwan can now leverage the power of the global logistics service provider’s network to export 30% more volume and get their shipments delivered within two business days to over 56 countries in Europe. Risks: High costs pose a significant threat to UPS investors.
